title: Forgot email, :/
body:
Forgot my full email, (not password) since i dont use it that much.
I can sign into my account though.

Can a rioter tell me my FULL email, cant remember if its ayylmaokai or ayyimaokai@outlook.com

replies.body: I got a couple things you may want to try, well....you'll have to do the second if you can't get the email off the hint @.@ So you'll want to go to Settings located up above ^ by your Summoner name and click manage account. It should give you a great hint at what that email is and if that doesn't work you should submit an [Account Recovery Ticket ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)so we can help you change it to something you do remember.

Hello

Send a ticket to [Riot support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en), they will help you solve this.

---

Eu Boards player helper
